EmailTemplate.name: Campaign Response
EmailTemplate.subject: Many thanks for registering
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
FAO: {!CampaignMember.FirstName} {!CampaignMember.LastName}
Many thanks for registering for the "{!Campaign.Name}" event on {!Campaign.StartDate}. We look forward to seeing you there and thanks for letting us know you dietary requiements of: {!CampaignMember.Diet__c}
